feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update MongoDB version to 6.7.0 by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14087

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.9...2.29.10

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Separate SQS migration into another environment variable by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14089

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.10...2.29.11

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow updating email via SCIM by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14088
  • Move secrets into backend-core. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14091
  • Row Step Automation UX updates and Automation refactoring by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14028

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.11...2.29.12

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Typescript improvements for CouchDB integration by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14086
  • Fix npm vulnerabilities by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14093
  • Support non-ascii column in SQS. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14094

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.12...2.29.13

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Ellipsis on long emails by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14098
  • Fix gen-collection-info script, was invalid TS by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14100
  • Detect secrets in error messages. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14090
  • Bump next from 12.1.0 to 14.1.1 in /examples/nextjs-api-sales by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14095
  • Bump browserify-sign from 4.2.1 to 4.2.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14096
  • Fix for builder relationship picker by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14109
  • Squash the oldRow prop in the external row controller by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14097
  • Handlebar helper lorem by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14102
  • Added new Generate automation button in the data section by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14101
  • Solving some invalid time filters by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14104
  • Adding default (sample) tables in SQS indexing by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14114

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.13...2.29.14
